import * as React from 'react'; import {useState} from 'react'; //import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import ButtonGroup from '@mui/material/ButtonGroup'; import AlertList from './AlertList'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import AlertForm from './AlertForm'; import AlertItem from './AlertItem'; import {Container, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; const alertListData=[ { "symbol":'sushi', "exchange":'pancake swap', "alert_price":'$0.62', "current_price":'$0.60', "notification_type":'DISCORD', }, { "symbol":'inv', "exchange":'sushi swap', "alert_price":'$0.71', "current_price":'$1.03', "notification_type":'WEB', }, { "symbol":'pickle', "exchange":'quick swap', "alert_price":'$1.41', "current_price":'$1.35', "notification_type":'TWITTER', }, ] export default function SearchButtonGroup() { const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); const handleInputChange=(event)=>{ const {value} = event.target; setSearch(value); console.log(search); } const [filter,setFilter] = useState("null"); const [buttonColor,setButtonColor] = useState("black"); const [modalShow, setModalShow] = React.useState(false); return ( {setFilter('SYMBOL')}}> {setFilter('EXCHANGE')}}> {setFilter('ALERT PRICE')}}> {setFilter('CURRENT PRICE')}}> {setFilter('NOTIFICATION TYPE')}}> setModalShow(false)}/>
{ alertListData.map((el,index)=>( )) } ); } /* */ /* SYMBOL EXCHANGE ALERT PRICE CURRENT PRICE NOTIFICATION TYPE + New Alert sushi pancake swap $0.62 $0.60 DISCORD CANCEL INV sushi swap $0.71 $1.03 WEB CANCEL */ /* 1 of 2 2 of 2 1 of 3 2 of 3 3 of 3 */
